description: A relaxing group stretching session in the cool shade of Aasee Park, perfect for warming up or cooling down during hot weather.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful park surrounding Aasee with shaded areas, perfect for a quick group stretching session or gentle yoga.

activity: Ice Cream Break at Alter Fischmarkt
description: Enjoy a quick group break while savoring delicious ice cream in Münster's charming Alter Fischmarkt under the summer sun.

locationInfo.description: Alter Fischmarkt is a historic square in the heart of Münster, ideal for a quick stop to cool off with ice cream or refreshing drinks.
safetyTips: Choose a shaded spot to relax.
Don't forget to bring cash for the ice cream vendors.
Eat quickly to avoid melting ice cream in the heat.

description: Gather your group and take a quick photo session at Prinzipalmarkt, capturing the iconic architecture and vibrant atmosphere of Münster.

locationInfo.description: Prinzipalmarkt is a beautiful historic square lined with colorful buildings, perfect for a memorable photo session with your group.
safetyTips: Make sure to stay hydrated while under the sun.
Wear sunscreen to protect your skin.
Avoid midday heat by taking photos early or late in the day.

activity: Quick Coffee Break at Röstbar Münster
description: Stop by the popular Röstbar for a quick coffee with your group to cool off and enjoy some refreshment in the heat.

locationInfo.description: A trendy coffee shop in Münster offering great coffee and cool air-conditioned space to refresh yourself with friends or family.
safetyTips: Cool down with an iced coffee or refreshing drink.
Enjoy the shaded outdoor seating for a comfortable break.
Wear light clothing to stay cool in the hot weather.

description: Gather your group for a fun and quick photo session at Schloss Münster, with the stunning palace and gardens as the backdrop.

locationInfo.description: Schloss Münster is a beautiful palace located in a park in the heart of the city. It's a great spot for group photos with stunning architecture and lush greenery.
safetyTips: Remember to drink water while taking photos.
Wear sunscreen to protect yourself from the sun.
Be mindful of the weather and take breaks to avoid heat exhaustion.
